Title: Heatrae Sadia R Plus 70 electric vented water heater 70ltr
Description: Ideal for commercial premises with no existing hot water storage, the Heatrae Sadia R Plus 70L vented water heater is capable of supplying multiple outlets with reliable, generous water. The compact, cistern-free design, universal bracketing and multidirectional overflow fixing of the 3kW R Plus point-of-use water heater ensures straightforward and flexible installation well-suited to awkward locations.
